amendment.description: To require campaign finance disclosures for certain persons benefitting from tar sands development.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 28 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 43. Record Vote Number: 26.

Amendment SA 28 proposed by Senator Whitehouse to Amendment SA 2. (consideration: CR S400-401, S406-407; text: CR S401) To require campaign finance disclosures for certain persons benefitting from tar sands development.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 28 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 43. Record Vote Number: 26.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 28 proposed by Senator Whitehouse to Amendment SA 2.
